docs.snippet: Chris Paul, who replaces Derek Fisher, is the first superstar to hold the president’s title since Patrick Ewing in 2001....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chris Paul, who replaces Derek Fisher, is the first superstar to hold the president’s title since Patrick Ewing in 2001.
docs.abstract: Los Angeles Clippers point guard Chris Paul is elected president of the players' association, defeating Roger Mason Jr.

headline.main: Clippers’ Paul Is Elected President of  N.B.A. Players Union

docs.snippet: Forest City Ratner Companies is looking for an investor to buy up to 80 percent of the rest of the $5 billion development in Brooklyn....
docs.lead_paragraph: Forest City Ratner Companies is looking for an investor to buy up to 80 percent of the rest of the $5 billion development in Brooklyn.
docs.abstract: Developer Bruce C Ratner is looking for an investor to buy up to 80 percent of remainder of the $5 billion Atlantic Yards development project in Brooklyn, which will eventually include 14 residential buildings and 6,000 apartments as well as offices and hotels; real estate analysts estimate deal could be worth as much as $800 million for Forest City Ratner Companies.

headline.main: To Enhance Atlantic Yards, a Plan to Sell a Big Part of It
headline.print_headline: To Enhance Atlantic Yards, A Plan to Sell A Big Part of It

docs.snippet: A British tourist, Sian Green, was struck when a cab driven by Faysal Himon jumped the curb onto a crowded corner....
docs.lead_paragraph: A British tourist, Sian Green, was struck when a cab driven by Faysal Himon jumped the curb onto a crowded corner.
docs.abstract: Taxi and Limousine Commission reports that New York City cabdriver Faysal Himon, whose cab jumped a curb in Midtown Manhattan, hitting British tourist Sian Green and severing her leg, faces suspension of his license; troubled driving history and previous violations for Himon have surfaced since crash, but it is not clear whether he faces criminal charges.

headline.main: Cabby Had Violations Before Crash in Midtown
headline.print_headline: Cabby Had Violations Before Crash in Midtown

byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and MARC SANTORA
